name: Spaceship Earth
theme: A journey through the history of human communication from cave paintings to the digital age.
short_description: EPCOT's iconic dark ride through a geodesic sphere exploring communication history.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy: Cosmic Rewind
theme: A reverse-launch roller coaster through space with the Guardians, featuring rotating vehicles and classic rock music.
short_description: An innovative indoor coaster with backward launch and rotating ride vehicles set to music.

name: Test Track
theme: Design your own virtual vehicle then test it at high speeds on outdoor tracks.
short_description: A high-speed ride simulating automotive testing with outdoor thrills.

name: Mission: SPACE
theme: A simulated space mission to Mars with intense G-forces and team roles (Orange) or milder Earth orbit (Green).
short_description: An intense space flight simulator offering two intensity levels.

name: Soarin' Around the World
theme: Hang glide over iconic landmarks around the world in a breathtaking flight experience.
short_description: A peaceful flying simulator soaring over global landmarks with stunning visuals.

name: Living with the Land
theme: A boat tour through greenhouses showcasing innovative agricultural techniques and ecosystems.
short_description: An educational boat ride exploring sustainable farming and ecosystems.

name: The Seas with Nemo & Friends
theme: A gentle ride searching for Nemo with projection technology blending animated characters with real fish.
short_description: A family-friendly dark ride combining Finding Nemo with a real aquarium.

name: Turtle Talk with Crush
theme: An interactive conversation with Crush the sea turtle in real time using advanced animation.
short_description: An interactive show where guests chat live with Crush from Finding Nemo.

name: Journey Into Imagination with Figment
theme: A sensory journey through the Imagination Institute with the beloved purple dragon Figment.
short_description: A whimsical dark ride featuring Figment exploring the five senses.

name: Frozen Ever After
theme: A boat journey through Arendelle celebrating a winter festival with Anna, Elsa, and friends.
short_description: A charming boat ride through the world of Frozen with beloved characters.

name: Remy's Ratatouille Adventure
theme: Shrink to rat size and scurry through Gusteau's restaurant in this trackless 3D adventure with Remy.
short_description: A trackless dark ride through a Parisian restaurant from a rat's perspective.

name: Gran Fiesta Tour Starring The Three Caballeros
theme: A gentle boat ride through Mexico following Donald Duck and the Three Caballeros.
short_description: A relaxing boat journey through Mexican culture with animated characters.

name: The American Adventure
theme: An Audio-Animatronic show celebrating American history, culture, and innovation.
short_description: A patriotic theatrical presentation of American history with advanced animatronics.

name: Impressions de France
theme: A widescreen film showcasing the beauty, culture, and landscapes of France.
short_description: A sweeping cinematic tour of France's iconic locations and culture.

name: Beauty and the Beast Sing-Along
theme: An interactive sing-along retelling of Beauty and the Beast hosted by Angela Lansbury as Mrs. Potts.
short_description: A theatrical sing-along celebrating Beauty and the Beast with audience participation.

name: Reflections of China
theme: A Circle-Vision 360° film exploring China's landscapes, cities, and cultural heritage.
short_description: An immersive 360-degree film journey through modern and ancient China.

name: Canada Far and Wide in Circle-Vision 360
theme: A Circle-Vision 360° film showcasing Canada's diverse landscapes and cultural spirit.
short_description: An immersive 360-degree cinematic tour of Canada's natural beauty.

name: Awesome Planet
theme: A short film celebrating the beauty and diversity of Earth's natural wonders.
short_description: An inspiring film about Earth's environments and conservation.

name: Luminous The Symphony of Us
theme: A nighttime spectacular on World Showcase Lagoon celebrating Disney music and global cultures with water, lights, and fireworks.
short_description: EPCOT's current nighttime show featuring fountains, lasers, and Disney songs.

name: Club Cool
theme: Sample complimentary Coca-Cola beverages from around the world in this refreshing lounge.
short_description: A free tasting experience featuring international Coca-Cola flavors.

name: Journey of Water, Inspired by Moana
theme: An interactive outdoor walkthrough exploring the water cycle inspired by Disney's Moana.
short_description: A hands-on exploration of water and nature with Moana theming.
